# How Appdome Protections Affect App Performance

Last updated November 22, 2025 by Appdome

Appdome is designed to minimize performance impact while ensuring strong, on-device mobile app security and optimal App Performance. By leveraging advanced techniques in mobile security, Appdome provides a robust solution that not only protects applications from threats but also ensures a seamless experience for users, regardless of the device they are using. This balance between security and performance is crucial in today’s mobile environment where users demand both safety and speed.

Appdome is built to minimize performance impact on mobile apps. By integrating only selected features, running on secure side threads, and avoiding unnecessary main thread usage, Appdome ensures that security protections only minimally affect startup time, memory consumption, or overall App Performance. Each feature can be carefully chosen based on the specific needs of the application, allowing developers to customize the security measures without overloading the app’s resources. This targeted integration process is essential for maintaining efficiency while enhancing security.

#### Selective Integration

Only the security features enabled during fusion are linked and compiled into the Appdome library. This ensures your app contains only what has been chosen—nothing extra is added that could slow down performance. For instance, if an app does not require certain anti-malware features, these can be omitted, making the app lighter and faster. This level of customization is vital for developers aiming to optimize their application’s performance while still providing necessary security measures.

#### Awareness of User Experience

Appdome serves some of the world’s largest brands and billions of end-users. Appdome takes care to ensure that ANR events, crash rates, and user experience metrics are not impacted. Our engineering approach is designed to safeguard performance while delivering enterprise-grade security.

#### Thread Management

Appdome executes security functions on secure side threads, offloading as much work as possible away from the app’s main UI thread. By avoiding the main thread, Appdome ensures security checks do not interfere with normal app operations or responsiveness. This method not only improves overall performance but also enhances user experience, as users can engage with the app without perceivable delays.

#### Effect on Main Thread

Appdome’s protections may only affect the main thread when encrypted resources are required early in the app lifecycle—for example, during startup. In this case, Appdome must decrypt the resource before the app can proceed, which can momentarily block the main thread. This behavior is necessary for the app to function properly and is limited to specific use cases. Appdome mitigates this impact by implementing strategic loading techniques, ensuring that users experience minimal delay during startup phases.

Appdome is committed to delivering strong mobile app security without compromising performance or user experience. To explore additional features and learn more about how Appdome works, visit our [Knowledge Base](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/).

In conclusion, Appdome not only provides robust security solutions but also emphasizes the importance of maintaining excellent app performance. Developers can confidently integrate Appdome’s security features, knowing that they will not detract from the user experience. As security threats continue to evolve, solutions like Appdome are essential for ensuring that mobile applications remain safe and efficient.
